original_text: Then people will take hold of you and they will give you pain. They will even kill some of you. People in every country will hate you because you are my disciples.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 너희를 환난에 넘겨 주겠으며 너희를 죽이리니 너희가 내 이름 때문에 모든 민족에게 미움을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Then people will take hold of you
and they will give you pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 너희에게 고통을 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will even kill some of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너희 중 일부를 죽이기까지 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: People in every country will hate you
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 나라의 사람들이 너희를 미워할 것이다
